tha-ap186:5.4: paggaṇhiṃ vatasiddhiyā → puttomhi hitasiddhiyā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | mūgomhi vata siddhiyā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap186:6.3: Buddharaṃsīhi phuṭṭhosmi → buddharaṃsyābhiphuṭṭhomhi (bj) | buddharaṃsīhi phuṭṭhomhi (sya1ed, sya2ed) | buddharaṃsābhighuṭṭhomhi (pts-vp-pli1ed) | buddharaṃsābhighuṭṭhosmi (mr)
